product_name: MUK LUKS Molly Slipper Boots - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The MUK LUKS Molly Slipper boots for girls go well with sipping cocoa by the fireside and watching the snow fall. Cozy, knit acrylic keeps her warm without being itchy or uncomfortable; warm polyester lining is soft and comfortable next to skin. Cinch the drawstrings around calves to seal in warmth. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles provide light traction indoors and out. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: The MUK LUKS Molly Slipper boots for girls go well with sipping cocoa by the fireside and watching the snow fall.
